sentences.sentence: He hates delay and procrastination in all its forms.
sentences.translation: 他厌恶各种形式的延迟和耽搁。

sentences.sentence: Though I desperately wanted to lay blame elsewhere, I finally had to admit that my bad habits had less to do with new-age technology and more to do with old-fashioned procrastination.
sentences.translation: 尽管我极力想把责任推卸到其他地方，但最终不得不承认，我的坏习惯与新时代的技术没什么关系，而与传统的拖延症关系更大。
